attributes.action: No to the minimum price per unit of alcohol.
attributes.additional_details:
I suggest the issue of minimum price per unit of alcohol be looked at again.

I do not see enough evidance to prove that a minimum price per unit of alcohol will stop a person drinking as much, it will simply just cost them more to have what they want to drink, it will not stop that person from having it.

It hit's the pockets of innocent people who can't afford the increase aswel as business.
